subject: Problem with setup()
msgSnippet: hi all when i am writing the test cases them if i initialize anything in the setup() method (which is to be used by all the methods) then on running the tests
messageBody:
hi all
when i am writing the test cases them if i initialize
anything in the setup() method (which is to be used by
all the methods) then on running the tests it gives me
NULL POINTER EXCEPTION.
i have to initilize everything then inside the
test<method>.
i have seen one case in which it doesnot give this
error if u initilize the common things in setup() but
i could not figure out why this was happening.

plz give ur response.
thanks

dinesh
